ta.title: மொபைல் போனில் ஒரு திரைப்பட வீடியோக்கள் நீதிமன்றத்திற்கு

summary_lines: A filmmaker secretly recorded his movie in a theater and later found it on a mobile phone, leading to a costly legal battle over its unauthorized release on social media. He emphasized the need for stricter laws against such actions, highlighting the importance of protecting intellectual property rights.
